Containers.Name: Coder
Containers.Description: Cloud-based development environment. Provision VS Code, JetBrains IDEs, and other development tools in cloud, on Kubernetes, or Docker.
Containers.Overview: Coder is a platform for provisioning self-hosted cloud development environments. Deploy VS Code or JetBrains IDEs, access them in your web browser, and code on any device with a consistent development environment.

Variable.Name: CODER_ADDRESS
Variable.Description: Address to bind Coder web server to

Variable.Name: CODER_TLS_ENABLE
Variable.Description: Enable TLS (use with reverse proxy for HTTPS)

Variable.Name: CODER_SECURE_AUTH_COOKIE
Variable.Description: Secure auth cookies (enable when using HTTPS)

Variable.Name: CODER_ALLOW_PATH_APP_SHARING
Variable.Description: Allow sharing single apps with path-based routing

Variable.Name: CODER_ALLOW_DEV_URLS
Variable.Description: Allow dev URLs for localhost development
